backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Starting next week, I want a weekly 30-min 1:1 with {name}. Afternoons preferred, avoid Fridays. Automatically reschedule on declines or conflicts.

gutts.name: ParseUserRequest
gutts.capability: Interpret the user’s natural language request to extract scheduling parameters such as participant name, duration, frequency, preferences, and start date.
gutts.user_goal: Clarify what the user wants to schedule.

gutts.name: CreateRecurringMeeting
gutts.capability: Generate a recurring 1:1 meeting event with a 30‑minute duration and weekly frequency in the user’s calendar.

gutts.name: DefinePreferredTimeSlot
gutts.capability: Select afternoon time slots while excluding Fridays for the meeting schedule.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure meetings occur at user‑preferred times.

gutts.name: ScheduleStartDate
gutts.capability: Set the recurrence start date to the first occurrence next week.
gutts.user_goal: Start the weekly meetings next week.

gutts.name: ConflictDetectionAndAutoReschedule
gutts.capability: Detect calendar conflicts and automatically reschedule the meeting to the next available slot.

gutts.name: AutoRescheduleOnDecline
gutts.capability: Monitor invitation responses and automatically reschedule the meeting if the invitee declines.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the meeting occurs even after a decline.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
